timeline.bodyText: Is it possible to change this to "Security Key Registration" ?
timeline.author: mposolda
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -338,7 +339,13 @@ auth-otp-form=OTP
 auth-password-form=Password
 auth-username-form=Username
 auth-username-password-form=Username and password
+
+# WebAuthn
 webauthn-authenticator=WebAuthn
 webauthn-authenticator-passwordless=WebAuthn Passwordless
+webauthn-login-title=WebAuthn Login
+webauthn-registration-title=WebAuthn security key registration

timeline.bodyText: Is it possible to change this to "Security Key Login" ?
